page.syntax: C ftp_file_xfer(C address ,C user ,C password ,C source_file ,C destination_file ,C GetPut [,L background [,C title ]])

argument.name: address
argument.description: The FTP address of the transmission. Character

argument.name: destination_file
argument.description: The file to save remotely. Character

argument.name: GetPut
argument.description:
Specifies the operating mode.
"get" = The specified file is downloaded from the server to the local system.
"put" = The specified file is uploaded to the server from the local system. Character

argument.name: background
argument.description: Logical. Optional. Default = .T. .T. = The displayed dialog is modeless. .F. = The dialog is modal, and the script pauses till the FTP transfer is complete.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. Default = "FTP Transfer". The title of the dialog box. Character

page.discussion: The FTP_FILE_XFER() function is a lower-level function that is wrapped by FTP_GET_FILE()and FTP_PUT_FILE().
